price: hanggang sa nang binuksan ang [saplad ng] Gog at Magog, habang sila mula sa bawat bakulod ay magmamatulin,
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فُتِحَتۡ يَأۡجُوجُ وَمَأۡجُوجُ وَهُم مِّن كُلِّ حَدَبٖ يَنسِلُونَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā futiḥat yajūju wamajūju wahum min kulli ḥadabin yansilūna
